title: Standing Man in a Sheepskin Coat
marks:
Date and Inscription

LRC, in pencil: [G (?) 281 LRC, in red chalk: [1778]
description: standing man with his PL hand on his hip, resting his PR elbow on a ledge; heavy-set man wears a small brimmed hat; long sheepskin overcoat, coat with large buttons and knickers
